close-with-changes.title: Are you sure?
close-with-changes.description: You have changes in progress. If you close without saving, you'll lose your changes. Are you sure you want to quit?

saved-since.hour-ago: Saved an hour ago | Saved {time} hours ago
saved-since.days-ago: Saved a day ago | Saved {time} days ago

saving-changes.error: An error occurred while saving changes.

exporting-scorm.success: Your simulation has been exported to SCORM {version}!
exporting-scorm.error: An error occurred while exporting the simulation.

no-mode-selected.title: No simulation mode selected.
no-mode-selected.description: At least one active option is required to save!

text.title: Text mode
text.description: Your learners will be playing in an SMS-like conversation.

audio.title: Audio mode
audio.description: Your learners will interact with the agent through a phone call.

video.title: Video mode
video.description: Your learners will meet the agent in a video call.

questions.label: Preparing questions
questions.description: The following questions will help the agent prepare for the conversation.

empty.title: No question
empty.description: You have not added any question yet. Start by adding one to the simulation.

system-prompt.label: System instructions
system-prompt.description: Describe the content of the simulation, its scenario, and possible outcomes.
